To call Queen Ria by her name without honorifics..."},{"lineNumber":160389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱ総統閣下様は偉い方なんだすなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Supreme Commander must really be someone important, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":160390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……総統閣下様が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...As for the Supreme Commander,"},{"lineNumber":160391,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どういう職なのかは存じませんだが","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know exactly what position he holds,"},{"lineNumber":160392,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら随分とリアに心服しとるようだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You all seem pretty devoted to Ria.\""},{"lineNumber":160393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へえ、この村がこんなに平和なのも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, the reason this village is so peaceful,"},{"lineNumber":160394,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全てはリーザス軍、ひいてはリア様のおかげです","translatedEnglishLine":"is all thanks to the Leazas Army, and ultimately to Lady Ria.\""},{"lineNumber":160395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とっても信頼していらっしゃるんですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You trust them very much, don't you.\""},{"lineNumber":160396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、もちろんだぁ、王がリア様に代わってから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, of course. Since the king was replaced by Lady Ria,"},{"lineNumber":160397,"originalJapaneseLine":"　税は下がるわ夜盗にも襲われねぇ、","translatedEnglishLine":"taxes have gone down and we aren't attacked by night bandits,"},{"lineNumber":160398,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オラ達もう本当に頭が上がらねぇだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"we really can't thank her enough.\""},{"lineNumber":160399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「世界は魔軍が来るとかでガタガタだそうだすが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Although the world is said to be in turmoil because the Demon Army is coming,"},{"lineNumber":160400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はははっ、リーザス軍なら絶対に安心だぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"hahaha, with the Leazas Army, it's absolutely safe.\""},{"lineNumber":160401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「呑気なこと言ってやがる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How carefree to say such things.\""},{"lineNumber":160402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「聞いたことあるわね。リーザスは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've heard about it. Leazas"},{"lineNumber":160403,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数年前から革新的な国策が打ち出され、","translatedEnglishLine":"has implemented innovative national policies in recent years,"},{"lineNumber":160404,"originalJapaneseLine":"　国が非常に安定するようになったみたい","translatedEnglishLine":"and the country has become very translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しくてなーんもない村ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a lonely village with absolutely nothing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんぞゆっくりなさっていって下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please, feel free to take your time and stay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくりしない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't be taking it easy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうですかい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is that so...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……総統閣下様ともなるとやはり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh... being the Supreme Commander, after all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お忙しくていらっしゃるようで……残念です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you must be very busy... it's a pity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………なんか、妙にサービスいいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...somehow, the hospitality is strangely good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おかしいぞ、この村。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This village is strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大変なご時世に歓待なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Welcoming guests in such difficult times..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、まさか食人村ではあるまいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha! Surely this isn't a cannibal village."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ととと、とんでもありませんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, absolutely not!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「国からお触れが出ただぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There was a notice from the country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緑の服を着なすった口の大きな方は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saying that the person wearing green clothes with a big mouth

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の総統閣下様、出来るだけ歓待すべし、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the Supreme Commander of the world, so they should be hospitably received as much as possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、さすがリアだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, as expected of Ria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺は気持ち悪いくらい気が利いてるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's unnervingly considerate about those things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぇ〜、あのリア女王を呼び捨てなさるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek! To call Queen Ria by her name without honorifics...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱ総統閣下様は偉い方なんだすなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander must really be someone important, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……総統閣下様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...As for the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう職なのかは存じませんだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know exactly what position he holds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前ら随分とリアに心服しとるようだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You all seem pretty devoted to Ria."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へえ、この村がこんなに平和なのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, the reason this village is so peaceful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てはリーザス軍、ひいてはリア様のおかげです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is all thanks to the Leazas Army, and ultimately to Lady Ria."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とっても信頼していらっしゃるんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You trust them very much, don't you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、もちろんだぁ、王がリア様に代わってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, of course. Since the king was replaced by Lady Ria,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 税は下がるわ夜盗にも襲われねぇ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: taxes have gone down and we aren't attacked by night bandits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オラ達もう本当に頭が上がらねぇだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we really can't thank her enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界は魔軍が来るとかでガタガタだそうだすが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although the world is said to be in turmoil because the Demon Army is coming,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はははっ、リーザス軍なら絶対に安心だぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hahaha, with the Leazas Army, it's absolutely safe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「呑気なこと言ってやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How carefree to say such things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聞いたことあるわね。リーザスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've heard about it. Leazas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数年前から革新的な国策が打ち出され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has implemented innovative national policies in recent years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国が非常に安定するようになったみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the country has become very stable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元々、肥沃な大地を持つところにそれだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, because they had fertile lands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ数年は国力がぐんぐん上がっているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the nation's power has been rapidly increasing these past few years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の事情に詳しいな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're quite knowledgeable about human affairs..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘味、安く手に入るのって一番はリーザスだから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For sweets, the cheapest place to get them is Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく来るの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I come here often."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘党の神様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The god of sweet lovers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘いのが好きなら焼き芋なんていかがですだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you like sweets, how about some baked sweet potato?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それくらいしか出せなくて申し訳ないだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry, that's about all I can offer..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「焼き芋……いいわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Baked sweet potato... sounds good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へえ、では早速準備を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, then I'll prepare it right away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと休んだらすぐに出発するからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll set off soon after a short rest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス、都市スケールの南――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas, south of the city scale—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、ここはリーザス軍と魔軍が戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, this place is where the Leazas Army and the Demon Army are fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has become the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 此方-ｺﾅﾀ-、リーザスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here—Konata, Leazas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍と白の軍と呼ばれる部隊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are units called the Red Army and the White Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼方-ｶﾅﾀ-、魔軍はその数倍の兵力を有し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Over there—Kanata, the Demon Army has several times their numbers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を矢面に立たせ戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using demons as the frontline in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――ッッッ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッラァーーーーーーーーーッ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Raaaahhhhhhh!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 複数の赤い斬撃が迸るように『同時』に放たれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several red slashes burst forth simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「グギャ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gugh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の一体は腕、別の魔物兵は首、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One demon soldier's arm, another's neck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の魔物兵は胴が、『同時』に斬り裂かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and another's torso were sliced simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおっ、なんと勇猛な！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, how brave!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍将軍の魔法剣バイ・ロードより放たれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Red Army general's magical sword Bai-Road was unleashed

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しくてなーんもない村ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a lonely village with absolutely nothing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんぞゆっくりなさっていって下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please, feel free to take your time and stay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくりしない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't be taking it easy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうですかい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is that so...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……総統閣下様ともなるとやはり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh... being the Supreme Commander, after all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お忙しくていらっしゃるようで……残念です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you must be very busy... it's a pity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………なんか、妙にサービスいいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...somehow, the hospitality is strangely good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おかしいぞ、この村。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This village is strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大変なご時世に歓待なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Welcoming guests in such difficult times..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、まさか食人村ではあるまいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha! Surely this isn't a cannibal village."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ととと、とんでもありませんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, absolutely not!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「国からお触れが出ただぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There was a notice from the country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緑の服を着なすった口の大きな方は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saying that the person wearing green clothes with a big mouth

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の総統閣下様、出来るだけ歓待すべし、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the Supreme Commander of the world, so they should be hospitably received as much as possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、さすがリアだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, as expected of Ria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺は気持ち悪いくらい気が利いてるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's unnervingly considerate about those things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぇ〜、あのリア女王を呼び捨てなさるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek! To call Queen Ria by her name without honorifics...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱ総統閣下様は偉い方なんだすなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander must really be someone important, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……総統閣下様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...As for the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう職なのかは存じませんだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know exactly what position he holds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前ら随分とリアに心服しとるようだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You all seem pretty devoted to Ria."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へえ、この村がこんなに平和なのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, the reason this village is so peaceful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てはリーザス軍、ひいてはリア様のおかげです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is all thanks to the Leazas Army, and ultimately to Lady Ria."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とっても信頼していらっしゃるんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You trust them very much, don't you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、もちろんだぁ、王がリア様に代わってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, of course. Since the king was replaced by Lady Ria,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 税は下がるわ夜盗にも襲われねぇ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: taxes have gone down and we aren't attacked by night bandits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オラ達もう本当に頭が上がらねぇだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we really can't thank her enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界は魔軍が来るとかでガタガタだそうだすが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although the world is said to be in turmoil because the Demon Army is coming,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はははっ、リーザス軍なら絶対に安心だぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hahaha, with the Leazas Army, it's absolutely safe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「呑気なこと言ってやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How carefree to say such things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聞いたことあるわね。リーザスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've heard about it. Leazas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数年前から革新的な国策が打ち出され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has implemented innovative national policies in recent years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国が非常に安定するようになったみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the country has become very stable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元々、肥沃な大地を持つところにそれだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, because they had fertile lands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ数年は国力がぐんぐん上がっているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the nation's power has been rapidly increasing these past few years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の事情に詳しいな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're quite knowledgeable about human affairs..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘味、安く手に入るのって一番はリーザスだから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For sweets, the cheapest place to get them is Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく来るの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I come here often."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘党の神様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The god of sweet lovers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘いのが好きなら焼き芋なんていかがですだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you like sweets, how about some baked sweet potato?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それくらいしか出せなくて申し訳ないだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry, that's about all I can offer..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「焼き芋……いいわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Baked sweet potato... sounds good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へえ、では早速準備を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, then I'll prepare it right away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと休んだらすぐに出発するからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll set off soon after a short rest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス、都市スケールの南――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas, south of the city scale—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、ここはリーザス軍と魔軍が戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, this place is where the Leazas Army and the Demon Army are fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has become the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 此方-ｺﾅﾀ-、リーザスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here—Konata, Leazas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍と白の軍と呼ばれる部隊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are units called the Red Army and the White Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼方-ｶﾅﾀ-、魔軍はその数倍の兵力を有し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Over there—Kanata, the Demon Army has several times their numbers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を矢面に立たせ戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using demons as the frontline in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――ッッッ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッラァーーーーーーーーーッ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Raaaahhhhhhh!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 複数の赤い斬撃が迸るように『同時』に放たれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several red slashes burst forth simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「グギャ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gugh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の一体は腕、別の魔物兵は首、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One demon soldier's arm, another's neck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の魔物兵は胴が、『同時』に斬り裂かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and another's torso were sliced simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおっ、なんと勇猛な！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, how brave!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍将軍の魔法剣バイ・ロードより放たれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Red Army general's magical sword Bai-Road was unleashed
